Love in its various forms acts as a major facilitator of [[interpersonal relationship]]s and, owing to its central psychological importance, is one of the most common themes in the [[creative arts]].

Love in its various forms acts as a major facilitator of [[interpersonal relationship]]s and, owing to its central psychological importance, is one of the most common themes in the [[creative arts]].<ref>{{cite web|title=Article On Love|url=http://www.slideshare.net/azharabbas/just-love|accessdate=13 September 2011}}</ref>
     
Love may be understood a part of the survival instinct, a function keep human beings together against menaces and to facilitate the continuation of the species.<ref name="Fisher">Helen Fisher. ''Why we love: the nature and chemistry of romantic love''. 2004.</ref>
